name: Marshall D. Teach (Blackbeard)
special ability: Yami Yami no Mi (Darkness) & Gura Gura no Mi (Quake)
description: A former Whitebeard crewmate and current Emperor of the Sea, known for his ambition and unique ability to wield two Devil Fruits.

name: Boa Hancock
special ability: Mero Mero no Mi (Love-Love Fruit), Haki
description: The Pirate Empress and ruler of Amazon Lily, who can turn anyone who lusts after her into stone.

name: Jinbe
description: The helmsman of the Straw Hat Pirates, a powerful Fish-Man focused on equality and duty.

name: Dracule Mihawk
description: A former Warlord and current co-leader of the Cross Guild, whose goal has been achieved: to be the strongest swordsman.

name: Usopp
class: Brave Warrior of the Sea Aspirant
description: The Straw Hat Pirates' sniper, whose dream is to become a brave warrior of the sea.

name: Vinsmoke Judge
description: The King of Germa and scientist who modified his children to be emotionless soldiers.

name: Sengoku
special ability: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu (Giant Buddha)
description: The former Fleet Admiral of the Marines, a master strategist and powerful fighter, focused on World Government stability.

name: Kuzan (Aokiji)
description: A former Marine Admiral who follows his own 'Lazy Justice' and now works with Blackbeard.

name: Sakazuki (Akainu)
description: The current Fleet Admiral of the Marines, who embodies 'Absolute Justice' with lethal determination.

name: Brook
special ability: Yomi Yomi no Mi (Resurrection Fruit), Soul King Music
description: The musician of the Straw Hat Pirates, a living skeleton whose dream is to reunite with Laboon.

name: Kaido
special ability: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu (Azure Dragon)
description: One of the Four Emperors, who sought the greatest death through constant warfare and violence.

name: Charlotte Linlin (Big Mom)
description: One of the Four Emperors, who dreamed of creating a racially unified kingdom where everyone could eat together.

name: Bartholomew Kuma
description: A former Warlord and officer of the Revolutionary Army who sacrificed his mind and body for his cause.

name: Buggy the Clown
description: The leader of the Cross Guild and one of the Four Emperors, achieving greatness purely by chance and reputation.

name: Silvers Rayleigh
class: Right Hand of the Pirate King
special ability: Master of all three Haki types
description: The 'Dark King', former first mate of the Roger Pirates, now a retired coating mechanic.

name: Tashigi
description: A Marine officer dedicated to retrieving all famous swords from the hands of pirates and criminals.

name: Benn Beckman
description: The first mate and tactician of the Red Hair Pirates, considered one of the most intelligent people in the East Blue.

name: Koby
description: A promising Marine officer who started as a chore boy and seeks to become a Marine Admiral and hero of the sea.

name: Jewelry Bonney
description: A member of the Worst Generation pirate crew who seeks revenge on the World Government.

name: Shiki the Golden Lion
description: A legendary pirate from the same generation as Roger and Whitebeard, who plans to dominate the world.
